message.content:
To identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period, we generally look for the "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS) in the income statement. This reflects the cost of inventory that was sold.

From the provided income statement, the "Cost of Goods Sold" is:

| Account           | Amount       | Date       |
|-------------------|--------------|------------|
| Cost of Goods Sold | 11600000.00  | 2024-02-05 |

Therefore, the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period is 11,600,000.00.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "11600000.00"} }
```
